conversation.thought:

Securing a match with Parent_C (P3) in Round 1 is a strong, stable outcome, especially since they are highly committed (P1 preference). The risk of rejecting P3 to wait for P1 or P2, who are likely to be matched by other high-priority nurseries, is too great. I will accept Parent_C.
